channel.title: Way to use SCAR with KO?
channel.description:
I tried using this simple script in Knight Online:
program New; var StopAtk,x,y:integer; begin ActivateClient; StopAtk := BitmapFromString(71, 12, 'z78DAED97CB11803008445' + 'B4A15F65F92DE9D641676F9E8C0C14B70041E6C70ADB15ABB1EE3' + 'DE7D3FB55F89CEFD1C1B73DA819435FE21D5931432773B9A88CFC' + 'E5FAB06E7C8B5792119F9F4CA5719FE54A5B1557538E765F5E1E7' + '259A145337A4F3FB9062FCB51D5B452A27725CFF991EFB3729EB2' + 'D93A3EA113395D9992A52BEEC6A49E5DF53F86EC3EC63DA7D9589' + '5CB5FDF23BCF17FFD3C786542FBB010F53FCE6'); Repeat wait(500+random(500)) SendKeys('b') wait(500+random(500)) SendKeys('r') wait(1000+random(1000)) Repeat wait(1000+random(500)) Until(FindBitmap(StopAtk,x,y)) until(false) end.
It just attacks the closed NPC to you. Anyways, when it starts, it doesn't do anything. But if KO is not open, it works. So does KO have some anti-cheat type of thing? Anyways, is there a way I can get SCAR to work on it?

item.title: Way to use SCAR with KO?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Still doesn’t work… It just causes it to lag. Could there be a way to change permissions on scar.exe so Xtrap is unable to disable it?

Edit: Not even on-screen keyboard works.

Read full topic
item.source: Way to use SCAR with KO?

item.title: Way to use SCAR with KO?
item.dc:creator: @Pyro Pyro
item.description:
@Pyro wrote:

Zach try keyup and keydown using byte codes for keys. If that doesnt work well then your out of luck

Read full topic
item.source: Way to use SCAR with KO?

item.title: Way to use SCAR with KO?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Isn’t that only for when it looks for bitmaps/colors? It should be able to send keyboard commands.

Edit: SendKeysVB and SendKeysSilent doesn’t work either. It just sits there, like nothing happened. The ctrl+alt+s and ctrl+alt+r shortcuts don’t work either.

Any way to get around the Antihack program (Google didn’t help much this time)?

Edit 2:
I found a program on Google that would let you force any process to end (taskmanager said “Access is denied” when I tried to use it to close Xtrap.exe"). So I used the application to close Xtrap.exe, and then about 3 or 4 seconds later KO closed. So maybe theres a way to get a cracked Xtrap, and “spoof” its existence. More Google time then… :mad:

Read full topic
item.source: Way to use SCAR with KO?

item.title: Way to use SCAR with KO?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

I tried using this simple script in Knight Online:

program New;

var
StopAtk,x,y:integer;

begin
ActivateClient;
StopAtk := BitmapFromString(71, 12, ‘z78DAED97CB11803008445’ +
‘B4A15F65F92DE9D641676F9E8C0C14B70041E6C70ADB15ABB1EE3’ +
‘DE7D3FB55F89CEFD1C1B73DA819435FE21D5931432773B9A88CFC’ +
‘E5FAB06E7C8B5792119F9F4CA5719FE54A5B1557538E765F5E1E7’ +
‘259A145337A4F3FB9062FCB51D5B452A27725CFF991EFB3729EB2’ +
‘D93A3EA113395D9992A52BEEC6A49E5DF53F86EC3EC63DA7D9589’ +
‘5CB5FDF23BCF17FFD3C786542FBB010F53FCE6’);

Repeat
wait(500+random(500))
SendKeys(‘b’)
wait(500+random(500))
SendKeys(‘r’)
wait(1000+random(1000))
Repeat
wait(1000+random(500))
Until(FindBitmap(StopAtk,x,y))
until(false)

end.

It just attacks the closed NPC to you. Anyways, when it starts, it doesn’t do anything. But if KO is not open, it works. So does KO have some anti-cheat type of thing?

Anyways, is there a way I can get SCAR to work on it?

Read full topic
item.source: Way to use SCAR with KO?
